channel.title: Comments on: Arrakis…Dune…Desert Planet
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Spencer Hankins
item.dc:creator: Spencer Hankins
item.description:
interesting...
didn't know of a board game, but that's awesome. I'm huge fan of DUNE and have played some of the video games. Let me know how that works out.
item.content:encoded:
interesting…

didn’t know of a board game, but that’s awesome. I’m huge fan of DUNE and have played some of the video games. Let me know how that works out.
